### Code

Inline code: `1 > 2`, `<hr>`

x

```html
1 & 2
1 > 2
```
y


```html
<img src="code.png" />

<hr>

<div class="code">foo</div>
```

```elixir
fn(x) -> x end
```

	1. A
	2. B
-->


<!-- https://www.w3.org/TR/html52/grouping-content.html#the-pre-element -->
<pre>
	<hr>
	inside pre & > <
	<samp>Sample inside PRE</samp>
</pre>

	<samp>
